title: benchmark/stats package is obsolete and unused - remove it
description: This seems like a leftover from the original benchmark implementation and can thus be removed.

comments.content: Does anyone see why this should remain? (I will wait ~2 days before actually removing it)
comments.author: Doron Cohen

comments.content: Just to make sure this is clear, the package in question is: o.a.l.benchmark.stats
comments.author: Doron Cohen
